194912.「そう わかったわ。\n 私が責任をもって 里親を探しておくわね。\n<end>:
Right, I got it. I'll make sure they find
a great new home.
<end>

194914.「新エテーネの村の 屋外で\n だいじなものから ネコバッグを使って\n 『ネコ:
Outside in the new village of Etaine, we're going to do "Catch a Cat" with a cat bag. We'll set up the cat cans, and we're ready to
go. If a cat comes near you and smells the food, wait until it finishes eating... And when she's full, she'll come and stay with
us. But be careful, you can't catch the cat inside your house or anywhere outside the new village of Athens...

194915.「ネコちゃんを 連れてくるのに必要なのが\n ネコ缶よ。\n<br>\n「ネコ缶:
The only thing you need to attract some cats is cat food.
There's two kinds of cat food...the cheap kind, which you can use as many times as you like; and the special kind.
The special kind of cat food will attract cats of a certain size more easily.
Sometimes Shini will give them to me. If you bring me 3 kinds of cats, I'll give one to you to show my thanks!
Ah, but don't worry! You'll still be able to find every kind of cat with or without the special cat food.

194916.「新エテーネの村にいる ネコちゃんには\n いろいろな 種類がいるみたいよ。\n:
There are many kinds of cats in the new Ethene village... When I was walking around outside, I noticed that each type of cat has
a specific area as its territory. There are different types of cats that are attracted to different areas, like around the caves or the
riverbanks... We'll have to look at this village map to see what kind of areas we're dealing with...

194917.「『お部屋のネコのお世話』では\n ネコちゃんの名前を 変えたり\n ネコちゃん:
You can change your cat's name and say goodbye to your cat in "Taking Care of Cats in Your Room"... Once you say goodbye to your
cat, you won't be able to see her again, so be careful... If you still have a cat you want to say goodbye to, please contact me...
I'll find a foster home for her...

194918.「『仲間を部屋に招く』では\n パーティのメンバーを おさそいして\n この部屋:
In "Invite Friends to Room," you can invite your party members to meet you in this room. You can take care of the cats in your room
with your party members. Isn't that wonderful? But be careful, if you leave this room, your invitation will be cancelled...

194919.「『ネコ家具の思い出』では\n お部屋に 家具がふえたときの様子を\n ふり返る:
In "Memories of Cat Furniture", you can look back at the time when you added furniture to your room... In the memories you look back
on, the cats in your room will appear, so it's interesting to look at them again...
